ai-patthana21.2:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.2:1.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana21.2:2.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana21.2:3.1_0: No cause has not been declared by the reason for this.
ai-patthana21.2:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the undeclared points.
ai-patthana21.2:3.1_2: Not because of loss of debt or threats, nor because of undeclared; for the sake of unsuitable activity; and for the sake of undeclared; and for the sake of undeclared;.
ai-patthana21.2:6.1_0: Nor is a cause or reason for the sake of the unskillful.
ai-patthana21.2:6.1_1: Nor will for the sake of the unskillful and not the reason for the sake of the skillful.
ai-patthana21.2:6.1_2: Nor is a cause or reason for the sake of both skillful and unskillful things as the reason for the sake of listening to the skillful.
ai-patthana21.2:7.1_0: No cause, what is the reason for this.
ai-patthana21.2:8.1_0: Nor are they cause or reason for the sake of unskillful and not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.2:9.1_0: based on the supporter of the existing support.
ai-patthana21.2:10.1_0: He doesn’t for the sake of neither skilled nor trained in the teaching for the sake of cause, for the sake of reason.
ai-patthana21.2:10.1_2: Nine things as a basis for ending the defilements.
ai-patthana21.2:11.1_0: He doesn’t for the sake of declaring his hindered by the teaching or the basis for three reasons.
ai-patthana21.2:11.1_2: There are nine on the basis for ending the defilements. Without the support or the range of the mind, there’s no increase or decrease.
